name: Necromantic Tenacity
summary: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.
description:
Your training against necromantic effects allows you to escape the worst of their touch. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical failure on such a save, you get a failure instead.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
